name: Mail_cc.set
summary: Function that deletes one's e-mail address from the Cc: list
description:
Bothered of receiving a copy of all your messages when you reply to a group of people ? Well, this file is for you ! 

In order to use it, source this file or delete its last line and call DelFromCC() by yourself.

It works fine with MUTT and ELM ; I haven't test any other MUA. MUTT defines the option metoo that should handle this... I've never successed to make it work properly :-((
install_details:
Once again, copy the file to wherever you are inspired and source it from your e-mail plugins.

All you have to do is to change my e-mail address to yours. This have to be done within the variables 'user' and 'domain'.
